basics.name: Manalu Nakanishi
basics.label: Graduate
basics.summary: I am a graduate of the University of Hawaii with a B.S. in Computer Science.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Serve take-away orders for Outback Steakhouse.
highlights: Multitask with taking orders, packing food and getting payment

work.summary: Make sushi for customers and operate the cash register.
Supervise and entertain 20+ kids for 6 hours.
highlights: Figuring out activities that the kids would have fun with
Working with coworkers to make the kids' summer awesome

volunteer.summary: Assist the Leaders supervise and entertain the group kids.
highlights: Learn to complete tasks efficiently when assigned
Cooperate with other junior leaders to help ease the work load for the leader

volunteer.summary: Help support the Overwatch League staff with their operations
highlights: Experience what it is like behind the scenes of a tier 1 Esports tournament
Learn about the job of the Overwatch League staff directly from the staffs working
Meet the Overwatch League professional players
Shadow over the work of Overwatch League's IT crew before, during, and after the tournament

awards.title: Academic Excellence in Math
awards.summary: Award given from nomination by a teacher for showing excellence in the subject of math.

awards.title: Mānoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: This scholarship is for first-time, degree-seeking students who enroll the semester after high school graduation. The student must be enrolled in a full-time course load of UH Mānoa credits.

awards.title: CSL Valorant Fall Brawl Champion
awards.summary: $2,500 prize given to team for winning first place in the NACE Starleague Collegiate Valorant Fall Brawl tournament.

awards.title: Collegiate Esports Invitational 2021 Valorant Champion
awards.summary: $5,000 prize given to team for winning first place in the Collegiate Esports Invitational 2021 Valorant tournament.
